name: pcalg::pc
description: Constraint-based learning using the PC algorithm
comment1: Defaults to the stable version of the algorithm (i.e. less order dependence).
comment2: User-supplied restrictions on edge orientation is only possible after the structure has been learned, and afterwards, the algorithmic edge orientation step may be repeated.

name: pcalg::fci
description: Constraint-based learning  from data where the data generating mechanism may include latent variables using the FCI algorithm
comment1: Defaults to the stable version of the algorithm (i.e. less order dependence).

name: pcalg::rfci
description: Constraint-based learning  from data where the data generating mechanism may include latent variables using the RFCI algorithm.
comment1: Defaults to the stable version of the algorithm (i.e. less order dependence).

name: pcalg::ges
description: Score-based learning  using the GES algorithm

name: pcalg::lingam
description: Full identification of causal model for data where the data generating mechanism is linear with non-Gaussian errors

name: pcalg::fciPlus
description: Constraint-based learning  from data where the data generating mechanism may include latent variables using the FCI+ algorithm.
comment1: Defaults to the stable version of the algorithm (i.e. less order dependence).

name: pgalg::ges as ARGES
description: Hybrid learning using constraint-based learning of a skeleton and scores-based learning for edge orientation (GES)

name: bnstruct::learn.network with sm
description: Scored-based learning using the Silander-Myllymaki algorithm
comment1: Claims to handle missing information, however it is imputed prior to causal structure learning and thus is not part of the learning procedure.
comment2: Allows for the user to specify restrictions in edge orientation by specifying a hierarchy of the nodes, corresponding to a grouped causal ordering.

name: bnstruct::learn.network with mmhc
description: Hybrid learning using the Max-Min Hill-Climbing algorithm.
comment1: Claims to handle missing information, however it is imputed prior to causal structure learning and thus is not part of the learning procedure.
comment2: Allows for the user to specify restrictions in edge orientation by specifying a hierarchy of the nodes, corresponding to a grouped causal ordering.

name: bnstruct::learn.network with sem
description: Hybrid learning using the Structural Expectation-Maximization algorithm that combines the MMHC-algorithm with the EM algorithm in order to handle missing information.
comment1: Claims to handle missing information, however it is imputed prior to causal structure learning and thus is not part of the learning procedure.
comment2: Allows for the user to specify restrictions in edge orientation by specifying a hierarchy of the nodes, corresponding to a grouped causal ordering.

name: bnlearn::gs
description: Constraint-based learning using the Grow-Shrink algorithm.

name: bnlearn::iamb
description: Constraint-based learning using the Incremental Association Markov Blanket algorithm.

name: bnlearn::fast.iamb
description: Constraint-based learning using the Fast Incremental Association algorithm.

name: bnlearn::inter.iamb
description: Constraint-based learning using the Interleaved Incremental Association algorithm.

name: bnlearn::hc
description: Scored-based learning using the Hill Climbing algorithm.

name: bnlearn::pc.stable
description: Constraint-based learning using the stable (i.e. less order dependent) version of the PC algorithm.

name: bnlearn::si.hiton.pc
description: Constraint-based learning using the Semi-Interleaved Hiton-PC algorithm.

name: bnlearn::tabu
description: Score-based learning using the Tabu Search algorithm.

name: bnlearn::mmhc
description: Hybrid learning using the Max-Min Hill Climbing algorithm.

name: bnlearn::rsmax2
description: Hybrid learning using the General 2-Phase Restricted Maximization algorithm.

name: catnet::cnFind on output from catnet::cnSearchSA
description: Score-based learning using maximum likelihood scoring and a Dynamic Programming search strategy, allowing for missing information.
comment1: Missing information is handled by local complete case analysis on sets of variables.

name: stablespec::stableSpec
output: List including an S4 graphNEL object (from graph package)
description: Score-based algorithm for structural equation models that uses stability selection for scoring.

name: deal::autosearch
output: List including an S3 network object
description: Baysian score-based learning with likelihood scoring and a greedy search strategy.
comment1: Bug for models with only numeric data. It is resolvable by inlcuding a trival categorical variable.

name: deal::heuristic
output: List including an S3 network object
description: Baysian score-based learning with likelihood scoring and a greedy search strategy with restarts and random perturbations.
comment1: Bug for models with only numeric data. It is resolvable by inlcuding a trival categorical variable.
